title.narrative: Fourth Health Sector Development Project - Additional Financing

description.narrative: The Asian Development Bank (ADB) approved the original project in 2010 which was designed to improve health sector efficiency, governance, and drug safety focusing on three key areas: hospital services in Ulaanbaatar, human resources development, and drug safety regime. The additional financing will significantly expand the original project's output establishing a demonstration multifunctional general hospital in Songinohairkhan District of Ulaanbaatar

participating-org.narrative: Ministry of Health (formerly Ministry of Health and Sports)

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

description.narrative: Improved health sector efficiency, governance, and drug safety

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
At least 50% reduction in the number of illegal, counterfeit, substandard, or not quality-assured drugs on the market in 2016 from 26% in 2007

description.narrative: Improved health sector efficiency, governance, and drug safety

title.narrative: A road map to establish 10 additional general hospitals by 2020 is approved by 2016

description.narrative: Improved health sector efficiency, governance, and drug safety

title.narrative: A transparent public reporting system on hospital performances and drug safety is in place by 2016

description.narrative: Improved health sector efficiency, governance, and drug safety
